item.title: Biden commutes sentences of nearly all federal death row inmates
item.description: The move reduces the sentence for all but three of the 40 inmates on federal death row.

item.title: WATCH: Meet the moms who shred the half-pipe
item.description: ABC Newsâ€™ Danny New visits a group of mothers who are finding joy and catching air at a skatepark in Brooklyn, New York.

item.title: Starbucks strike expands to 3 more cities ahead of Christmas
item.description: The Workers United union strike is in its third of five planned days amid a busy holiday season for Starbucks.

item.title: What's in the approved government funding bill
item.description: After days of heated negotiations on Capitol Hill, the House passed its funding bill to prevent a government shutdown Friday night.
